message:
SYSTEM: CVOscarCorcho_CICYT_29Abril2013.pdf: Página 87
Curriculum Vitae, Oscar Corcho García, 1/11/2012 
Página 87 
 
Otros méritos o aclaraciones que se desee hacer constar 
REVISIONES DE ARTÍCULOS PARA REVISTAS, CONGRESOS Y WORKSHOPS 
Revistas (no miembro del comité editorial):  
- 
En JCR: Journal of Web Semantics, International Journal of Human-Computer Studies, IEEE Internet 
Computing, IEEE Intelligent Systems, International Journal on Data & Knowledge Engineering (DKE), IEEE 
Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering, Future Generation Computer Systems, Language 
Resources and Evaluation, Technovation, Computer, IEEE Transactions in Mobile Computing, Journal of 
Universal Computer Science; Journal of Information Science; Information Systems Frontiers, special issue 
on “Intelligent Systems and Smart Homes”; BMC Bioinformatics, Journal of Network and Computer 
Applications, Quality and Safety in Health Care. 
- 
No JCR: Applied Ontology; Intenational Journal of Metadata, Semantics and Ontologies; MultiAgent and Grid 
Systems; Journal of Brazilian Computer Society; it - Information Technology: Methods and Applications of 
Informatics and Information Technology; Electronic Commerce Research and Applications, ACM 
Transactions on Autonomous and Adaptive Systems, Inteligencia Artificial. 
Conferencias (no miembro del comité de programa): ESWC2007, e-Science 2006 y 2007 (2nd/3rd IEEE 
International Conference on e-Science and Grid Computing), ASWC2006 (1st Asian Semantic Web Conference), 
ECAI2006, IJCAI’03; WWW2003 y WWW2008; ESWS2004 (First European Semantic Web Symposium), 
KCAP05 (Third International Conference in Knowledge Capture); IUI2002 (Intelligent User Interfaces); KR2002 
(Knowledge Representation and Reasoning); EKAW02, EKAW04 (13th, 14th International Conference on 
Knowledge Engineering and Knowledge Management); SEKE04 (16th International Conference on Software 
Engineering and Knowledge Engineering); SCI (Software and Conceptual Infrastructure) 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 
2005; WMSCI (World Multi-Conference on Systemics, Cybernetics and Informatics) 2005, 2006; CCCT 
(International Conference on Computing, Communication and Control Technologies) 2004, 2005, 2006; ECIS 
(European Conference on Information Systems) 2005, CBMS2007 (20th IEEE International Symposium on 
Computer-Based Medical Systems), CDVE (International Conference on Cooperative Design, Visualization and 
Engineering) 2007, 2008. 
Workshops (no miembro del comité de programa): ECAI'00 Workshop on Applications of Ontologies and 
Problem Solving Methods; IJCAI'01 Workshop on Applications of Ontologies and Information Sharing; ECAI'02 
Workshop on Ontologies and Semantic Integration; ECAI’02 Workshop on Knowledge Transformation for the 
Semantic Web; ECAI’04 Workshop on Semantic Integration, SBIA2004 Workshop on Ontologies and their 
Applications, ISWC2005 Workshop on Semantic Web Enabled Software Engineering (SWESE), Workshop 
“OWL: experiences and directions, 2005”. 
Libros: Emergent Web Intelligence (Springer Verlag, serie Studies in Computational intelligence). 
 
CHARLAS INVITADAS 
35. Data Integration at the Ontology Engineering Group. Project CrEDIBLE Thematic Working Days. 15 Octubre 
2012. 
34. Ingredients for the Semantic Sensor Web. Universidad Pública de Navarra. Pamplona. 12 Marzo 2012. 
33. DynaLearn: Tecnologías semánticas en un contexto de aprendizaje basado en resolución de problemas. 
Seminario eMadrid sobre “Web de datos para la Educación”. Madrid. 20 Enero 2012. 
32. An attempt to build an ontology of Patient Safety. OpenHealth Spain 2011. Barcelona. 28 Noviembre 2011. 
31. Linked Data y Administración Pública. Keynote Speech. LatinAmerican Conference on Network and 
Electronic Media (LACNEM2011). San José. Costa Rica. 17 Noviembre 2011. 
30. Linked Data: oportunidades y riesgos. Jornadas de Ingeniería del Software (JIS2011). La Laguna. 10 
Noviembre 2011. 
29. Ingredients for the Semantic Sensor Web. Jozef Stefan Institute. Eslovenia. 23 Septiembre 2011. 
28. Estado actual de la combinación de semántica y multimedia. Keynote Speech. LatinAmerican Conference on 
Network and Electronic Media (LACNEM2010). Cali, Colombia. 9 Septiembre 2010. 
27. Ontology-based Data Integration. III Seminario de Ontologias no Brasil – ontoBRAS. Florianópolis, Brasil. 31 
Agosto 2010. 
26. Acquiring context in Ontologies. Cast Pre-Mobile Summit workshop on “Putting Services into Context”. 15 
Junio 2010. 
25. Semantics in Sensor Networks. Workshop on Semantics and Future Internet. Berlín. 1 Septiembre 2009.
speaker: SYSTEM
